pages.text: The fire starter is a simple device made of sticks.$(br2)While it only has a single use and requires you to channel for a few seconds before the fire begins, it is a convenient alternative to flint & steel.

While channeling the fire starter, it is possible to see where the fire will be placed due to the smoke particles emanating from that block.$(br2)$(info) It is possible to use a fire starter to $(l:rituals/fire_starter)start a pyre$().
